line_1: To warring winds, and to their furious peals
line_2: Yes, thou shalt smile again! — Time always heals,

line_1: To warring winds, and to their furious peals
line_2: The settling billows tremble — Morning steals

line_1: To warring winds, and to their furious peals
line_2: From the streak'd east, the radiant Orb unveils,

line_1: From heav'nly climes propitious thunder peals!
line_2: But, hark! as bow'd to earth the Bramin kneels,
